settings.q: Are Kids Station's products safe for newborns?
settings.a: Yes, absolutely. üë∂ All Kids Station products are designed with newborn safety in mind. We use baby-safe, non-toxic materials, and test every product for comfort, stability, and hygiene, so parents can trust our products from day one.

settings.q: Are the bed rails covered under any warranty?
settings.a: Yes, Kids Station Bed Rails come with a 3-month warranty covering manufacturing defects in the frame (such as weld breaks, joint issues, or locking mechanism faults).

settings.q: How can I make sure I order the correct bed rail size?
settings.a:
Please measure your mattress or inner bed dimensions, not the outer bed size.

Our bed rails are designed to fit securely based on the sleeping area (mattress size) not the wooden or metal frame around it.

ü™Ñ Tip: Measure the length and width of your mattress from edge to edge in centimeters or feet before placing your order.

Yes! üçº All Kids Station feeding products are 100% BPA-free, phthalate-free, and made from food-grade, non-toxic materials. They are completely safe for babies and meet international safety standards for infant feeding.

settings.q: Is the baby carrier safe for newborns and toddlers both?
settings.a:
Yes! üë∂ The Kids Station Baby Carrier is designed to grow with your baby from newborn (3 months) up to toddlers around 15 kg.

Made from breathable 100% cotton, it‚Äôs perfect for the Indian climate and gentle on your baby‚Äôs skin.

settings.q: Are your products Made in India?
settings.a:
Yes! üáÆüá≥ All Kids Station products are proudly Made in India.

Our designs are created specially for Indian parents and homes, keeping local needs, safety, and comfort in mind. We focus on quality manufacturing, thoughtful design, and baby-safe materials all crafted right here in India.
